title: League Client Alpha
body:
I'm not sure if this would go under Help & Support but,

I just got accepted to test out the League Alpha Client, but I have not yet been accepted into the PBE so is there anyway I can get in or do I have to just keep submitting requests to get into it? Help please

Thank you, badboy o3o

replies.body:
Congrats on getting access to the Alpha Client! 

Since PBE Access and Alpha Client Access are two different invite pools/systems, you'll simply need to be patient and wait to be accepted into the PBE. Spamming requests to request access will not increase your chances of getting in. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Can you get me in, please? I've waited for a really long time! <3
So I can't really do anything on the Alpha Client until I get accepted into the PBE though right?

While having a PBE account that is linked to a live account is one way of getting access to the Alpha Client, you can also gain access by simply applying and being accepted. Since you've been accepted the traditional way (apply and wait), you can jump right into the Alpha Client without needing a PBE account. Visit [this page](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/alpha) to download and install the Alpha client if you haven't already.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Well I tried to log in with my original account and it doesn't let me I will try again here shortly. I don't know if it's just a glitch, but we'll see thank you. :)
Ok Nvm, It let me in, THANK YOU SO MUCH for the help lol. I'll make sure to find out as many bugs as i can :) glad to help.
